item.title: Coexist - Demo, by FourEyes | Creeper World 4 Colonies #3281
item.description: Description of this map: The creep on this world is particularly hard to eradicate due to low resources and a vicious stash. The emitters are difficult to nullify, and an uneasy equilibrium is the only way to avoid destructive waves of creep. Your mission today is simple - just activate the totem and get out of here! This is a demo/proof of concept for the coexist map type. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe!

item.title: Hints FPS Edition, by buttRcaT | Creeper World 4 Colonies #3469
item.description: Description of this map: Ima stop putting the difficulty I think the title deserves in, because a wise hooman told me not to :) I’ll put the difficulty in a tag instead, no idea why I put them in the title lmao. I’ll start to ramp up the difficulty at War and Peace :) I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video!

item.title: Farsite FPS Edition -EASY-, by buttRcaT | Creeper World 4 Colonies #3419
item.description: Description of this map: The emitter things emit 4X the original amount of creeper, also every minute they send out a larger wave. You’ll have to pay alot more attention to your surroundings here, as the creeper is attacking from all sides… Also stand ontop the temple for a nice view, if you’ve got the time : ) I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video!

item.title: NEOCursor 3: Terrain Amplifier by TrickyCorp | Creeper World 4 Colonies #3341
item.description: Description of this map: Guess the terrain on this world is amplified with a 1:10 ratio. Surely that means it’s easier, right? I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! item.title: TD: Variety, by TrickyCorp | Creeper World 4 Colonies #3424
item.description: Description of this map: Another turret and multiple new enemy types? This is starting to get difficult. Make sure to use the right turret for the right enemy! Beam works best against weak enemies, Pulse works best against stronger targets. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video! #CreeperWorld4 #Gaming #PRG Prefer to watch this post on YouTube? No problemo, Click here!

item.title: The Great Damage Test, by TrickyCorp | Creeper World 4 Colonies #3352
item.description: Description of this map: Fast Bertha was dealing like no damage so I buffed it’s firerate (ammo cost) and damage. Also increased UberShot shooting cooldown and shooting cost because it was firing too fast for people to even be able to see lol. Oh btw I messed with creeper flow. I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video!

item.title: Solar Farm Fortress, by Bointston | Creeper World 4 Colonies #2936
item.description: Description of this map: Our Drone Scouts have detected a new planet suitable for cleansing… The humans are using this planet to built solar farms and have constructed an impressive fortress outpost…destroy this plague and show the humans no amount of their guns, walls, or hubris will protect them from the glory of the creep I publish videos daily, like and subscribe! Leave a comment to let me know what you think about the video!
